property.name: ase.username
property.description: The username to be used to authenticate to AppScan Enterprise

property.name: ase.password
property.description: The password to be used to authenticate to AppScan Enterprise

property.name: ase.acceptSsl
property.description: Whether to ignore SSL certificate errors when authenticating to AppScan Enterprise

property.name: asse.dir
property.description: The directory containing the AppScan Source installation

property.name: ase.dir
property.description: The directory containing the AppScan Enterprise installation

property.name: scanWorkspace.dir
property.description: Scan results and other scan artifacts will be written in this directory

property.name: assessment.file
property.description: Scan results will be written to this file in the scan workspace directory

property.name: applicationName
property.description: The name of the PAF file for the project to be scanned

property.name: asse.scanConfiguration
property.description: The name of one of the Scan Configurations made available by AppScan Source

property.name: ase.target.dir
property.description: The scan results will be published into this folder on the AppScan Enterprise server
